com.google.code.play2.plugin

Class AbstractPlay2Mojo

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.maven.plugin.AbstractMojo
      • com.google.code.play2.plugin.AbstractPlay2Mojo
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ContextEnabled, Mojo
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    AbstractAntJavaBasedPlay2Mojo, AbstractArchivingMojo, AbstractPlay2AssetsCompileMojo, AbstractPlay2EnhanceMojo, AbstractPlay2SourceGeneratorMojo, AbstractPlay2StopServerMojo

    public abstract class AbstractPlay2Mojo
extends AbstractMojo
    Abstract base class for Play! Mojos.
    Author:
    Grzegorz Slowikowski
